mapper.select: select * from user_tb where not role = 'lawyer' or role is null

select u.id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.phone_num, u.role, u.status, l.id lawyer_id, l.origin_profile_name, l.upload_profile_name, l.origin_license_name, l.upload_license_name, l.introduction, l.law_firm, l.office_num, l.counseling_amount from user_tb u left join lawyer_detail_tb l on u.id = l.user_id where u.role = 'lawyer' order by field(status, 0, 1, 2)
select p.*, u.nick_name from post_tb p left join user_tb u on p.user_id = u.id
select p.*, u.nick_name from post_tb p left join user_tb u on p.user_id = u.id where p.id = #{id}
select count(*) > 0 from post_tb where id = #{id}
select count(*) from user_tb where role = 'user' and status = 1
select count(*) from user_tb where role = 'lawyer' and status = 1
select count(*) from user_tb where role = 'lawyer' and status = 0

select u.id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.phone_num, u.role, u.status, l.upload_profile_name, l.upload_license_name, l.introduction, l.law_firm, l.office_num, l.counseling_amount from lawyer_detail_tb l join user_tb u on l.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{id}
